results.title: As the mirror burns
results.creator_credit: Cristina Pozzan, Diane Bretherton and Musical Films
results.brief_description: In this illuminating documentary, Melbourne psychologist and peace activist, Dr. Di Bretherton, reveals the untold story of the women in the Vietnam War. Few people are aware that women made up a large proportion of the Vietnamese forces. As she travels through the Vietnam of the 90’s, Di Bretherton introduces us to the women who fought for their country, living with their families in complex tunnel systems, as their country was bombed and defoliated. The film also covers the long-term effects of the war caused by chemicals such as Agent Orange.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Cristina Pozzan, Diane Bretherton and Musical Films
results.description: In this illuminating documentary, Melbourne psychologist and peace activist, Dr. Di Bretherton, reveals the untold story of the women in the Vietnam War. Few people are aware that women made up a large proportion of the Vietnamese forces. As she travels through the Vietnam of the 90’s, Di Bretherton introduces us to the women who fought for their country, living with their families in complex tunnel systems, as their country was bombed and defoliated. The film also covers the long-term effects of the war caused by chemicals such as Agent Orange.
description_for_label: In this illuminating documentary, Melbourne psychologist and peace activist, Dr. Di Bretherton, reveals the untold story of the women in the Vietnam War. Few people are aware that women made up a large proportion of the Vietnamese forces. As she travels through the Vietnam of the 90’s, Di Bretherton introduces us to the women who fought for their country, living with their families in complex tunnel systems, as their country was bombed and defoliated. The film also covers the long-term effects of the war caused by chemicals such as Agent Orange.

MPEG-4 Digital File; ACMI Digital Access Copy - overscan

results.title: As good as it gets
results.creator_credit: James L. Brooks, Bridget Johnson, Kristi Zea and Tri-Star Pictures
results.brief_description: Melvin (Jack Nicholson) has established a regimented lifestyle which enables him to cope with his obsessive-compulsive disorder. His routine existence is interrupted by changes in the lives of his neighbour Simon (Greg Kinnear), and his waitress Carol (Helen Hunt). Caring for Simon’s dog, and his involvement in Carol’s personal life puts him back in touch with a humanity which has been lacking in his structured life. Powerful performances from Jack Nicholson and Helen Hunt, who both won Best Actor Oscars for their efforts.
results.creator_credit_for_label: James L. Brooks, Bridget Johnson, Kristi Zea and Tri-Star Pictures

results.title: Pharmacy
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the pharmacist at work in the preparation of preventative and curative medicines. Discusses careers in the corner pharmacy, in a large pharmaceutical company or in a hospital.

results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.

results.title: Mechanical engineering
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows the many activities of the mechanical engineer in designing and constructing machinery of every kind. The student needs to be good at mathematics and science. Shows him involved in the study of technical drawing, principles of air conditioning, of refrigeration, internal combustion, jet engines and how they perform under various conditions.

results.title: Journalism
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A straightforward account of a sometimes over-glamorised profession. The copy boy carries out menial tasks; the cadet learns how to report crime, general, parliamentary, financial and sporting news. The erratic hours of work are shown to apply to radio and television journalism as well as to newspaper work, and the basic demands of the work are similar.
results.description:
